name: GameJam - Home - Shelter
description:
Protect yourself from the incoming elements by building a fort around yourself!

Instructions:

- Drag blocks around with left mouse click

- Rotate blocks with scroll wheel

- Blocks will stick to each other

- White timer is survival time needed to win

- Red timer is incoming danger

- The floor is lava

Made by Joey Scalf (Stick Figure) & Me (The Rest) in 9 hours of work time 

"Its not great but it's something!"
